biography.value:
Captain Theron Blackwood commands the City Watch of Aethermoor with an iron will and unwavering dedication to justice. A veteran of numerous conflicts, his scarred face and graying temples speak to years of service. Despite his stern demeanor, he has a soft spot for those who genuinely try to do good.

Personality: Stern but fair, loyal to his city above all else.

Ideal: Order - Without law, civilization crumbles.

Bond: He lost his family to bandits years ago and will do anything to prevent others from suffering the same fate.

Flaw: He trusts the law more than people.
